department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: "Intended for use in an introductory course on biomaterials, taught primarily in departments of biomedical engineering. The book covers classes of materials commonly used in biomedical applications, followed by coverage of the biocompatibility of those materials with the biological environment. Finally, it covers some in-depth applications of biomaterials. It does all of this with an overall emphasis on tissue engineering."
goal.ch: "Intended for use in an introductory course on biomaterials, taught primarily in departments of biomedical engineering. The book covers classes of materials commonly used in biomedical applications, followed by coverage of the biocompatibility of those materials with the biological environment. Finally, it covers some in-depth applications of biomaterials. It does all of this with an overall emphasis on tissue engineering."

textbook.en: W. D. Callister and D. G. Rethwisch. Fundamentals of Materials Science and Engineering. Fifth Edition, 2016, Wiley.
textbook.ch: W. D. Callister and D. G. Rethwisch. Fundamentals of Materials Science and Engineering. Fifth Edition, 2016, Wiley.

grading.ch: 期中考 40% 期末考 40% 出席率 20%"

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 無

ch.competency: 熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 無

ch.competency: 熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 無

ch.competency: 發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習
